content.title: Version 2 (Feb 2015)
content.content: This is the free Techdemo of BeamNG.drive.[br][br]It is limited to [b]one vehicle and one level[/b].[br][br]Press the F1 key in the game for a control overview.[br][br]If you want more, you can follow our progress in our blog or support our development by entering the alpha testing phase here. [br] [br]We hope you will have fun![br][br]
